summary: A working class woman tries to figure out whether to fall in love with a young boy or use him for money.
cast: Armi Toivanen|Santeri Helinheimo Mäntylä|Juha Kukkonen|Max Ovaska|Sanna-Kaisa Palo|Asko Sahlman|Mazdak Nassir|Mursu Heikkilä|Iris Olsson|Jussi Rautaniemi|Anu Maja|Lasse Nousiainen|Tero Salenius|Silja Nuotio|Lena Duncker|Henrik Duncker
title: Korsoteoria
